title: random Disconects from game/launcher crush since last mini update with lux skin
body:
any1 else have the same problem??

Edit: 
"an unkown error has accurred
its reported to the server...."
 


im in custom game now and got 6k ping.( my net is fine i did speed test all other games fine) help please
and my profile empty(not loading)

replies.body: When exactly are you getting an unknown error?  Are you on the updated or legacy client?  A lag spike like this would be more of a network problem and not a crash.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader), and let me know what you find from those matches.  Let me know with more details!

Hello , just got fixed.
This problem begin same time when downloaded the "mini update with skin lux"/
Problem was from Telus , my Net company, My Download speed was fine , problem was Upload speed on 0 speed !
sorry and thanks for help.

its make me think problem was from the game, but it was from my side. 
SOrry
also LOL web site very slow... Im from Canada if it helps.
